actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide for automatic cost-of-living adjustments in the income tax and withholding rates.
short_title: Income Tax and Withholding Rate Cost-of-Living Adjustment Act of 1979

summary.text: Income Tax and Withholding Rate Cost-of-Living Adjustment Act of 1979 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to require annual cost of living adjustments to individual income tax brackets and to withholding tables.

titles.title: Income Tax and Withholding Rate Cost-of-Living Adjustment Act of 1979
A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide for automatic cost-of-living adjustments in the income tax and withholding rates.
